item.title: AzureDevOps and hosted agents
item.description: TLDR Today I’m going to talk about self-hosted build agents. After reading this post you will be able to host your own Windows or macOS build agent (we’ll run it on your laptop) and use it to execute AzureDevOps Pipeline. Motivation It’s common to run different steps of your build and deployment on different machines. You build steps can have different requirements, for example: Compute and disk space requirements Software requirements (SDKs, OSs) Lifecycles Location (geolocation, network isolation) AzureDevOps and GitHub support two differet types of build agents:
